description:
The current implementation of volume_metadata in nova/volume/cinder.py stores each piece of metadata as a list of dicts with key names of "key" and "value". The only piece of code that uses the metadata does extra work to unravel this into simple key/value pairs before using the data.

The implementation in nova/volume/cinder.py should be updated to store the metadata as simple key/value pairs.
title: volume metadata structure represented as list instead of key/value pairs
